labels.analysis: The Hyperspell MCP Server primarily focuses on providing real-time spell checking and correction capabilities for applications. Its core functionality enhances text accuracy and clarity, improving user experience by catching spelling errors promptly. The available tools include adding files or websites from URLs and integrating plain text documents or memories into the system, indicating that it can process various text sources. This suggests a focus on text processing, error correction, and integration into existing workflows.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Content Creation" was chosen because Hyperspell's core functionality revolves around improving the quality and accuracy of written content. The secondary label "Web Search & Research" was included because users might integrate website URLs for spell checking, which involves processing online content. No custom label is needed as the predefined categories adequately cover the server's functionality.

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@hyperspell/hyperspell-mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
